Develop a smart sensor system that detects the grass height and adjusts the mower's blades accordingly, ensuring optimal grass cutting.
Create a self-driving lawn mower that uses AI and GPS technology to navigate the lawn and avoid obstacles.
Develop a lawn mower with a built-in sprinkler system that automatically waters the grass as needed.
Create a lawn mower with a modular design that allows users to easily switch between different cutting modes (e.g. mulching, bagging, etc.).
Develop a lawn mower with a built-in composting system that collects grass clippings and turns them into nutrient-rich compost.
